name: Landslide Car Crash
description:
Welcome to Landslide Car Crash where as legendary driver you have to shoot, attack and hit the enemy cars to destroy them. Landslide Car Crash is a game here you have to race for life. As a destructive driver of demolition derby car arena you have to smash the reckless enemy cars

Features:
- Beautiful derby racing track
- No roads you have to fight on off-road
- realistic car damage and destruction
- Dangerous tracks for cars war
- Real sound of missile hitting and smashing
